member.summary: Clears the report viewer navigation history

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.ClearHistory
member.summary: Clears the report viewer navigation history.
member.remarks:
Use this method to remove all viewer history records generated:
From method after the property is changed.
From method with different parameter values.
From interactivity action.
All history records including for the currently shown ReportSource are deleted.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.NavigateBack
member.summary: Navigates the viewer back one step in the navigation history.
member.remarks:
Check if this operation is enabled. If not, exception is thrown.
The property will reflect the change in the currently shown report.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.NavigateForward
member.summary: Navigates the viewer forward one step in the navigation history.
member.remarks:
Check if this operation is enabled. If not, exception is thrown.
The property will reflect the change in the currently shown report.

This object will be disposed by the ReportViewerBase.Dispose() method.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.CanMoveToPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines whether the viewer can be navigated to a specified page.
member.param: The page number to determine navigation possibility.
member.returns: Returns true if the viewer can be moved to the specified page.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.Reset
member.summary: Resets the control to its default values.

members.member:
Loads and refreshes the current report source in the viewer.
A new history record will be added in the report history. .

Loads and refreshes the in the viewer.
Use this method to display in the viewer the report source from the property.
Fresh report data is pulled from the report source data sources. Adds new history record in the report history right after the current record and the new record becomes current.
This method should not be called before the Form.Load() event is fired (avoid using it in the Form's constructor). .

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.Preview
member.summary: Renders the report in the viewer passing the currently entered parameter values to the report.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.CancelRendering(System.Int32)
member.summary: Stops background processing of the report.
member.returns: A Boolean value. A value of true is returned if the background rendering has terminated. A value of false is returned if background rendering has not terminated after the amount of time specified in the millisecondsTimeout parameter has elapsed, or if the millisecondsTimeout parameter was set to 0.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to wait for the background rendering to terminate. A value of -1 waits forever. A value of 0 returns immediately without waiting for the rendering to terminate.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.CancelRendering
member.summary: Stops the background processing of the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.WinForms.ReportViewerBase.SearchMetadataOnDemand
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the search metadata will be delivered on demand or by default.
member.remarks: Enabling search will notify the report engine to produce search metadata while rendering the report. This metadata is used by the report viewer in search dialog and in the report viewer area for highlighting the found and selected items. Default value: false

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Uri
member.summary: A Uri token. Will be included in the connection string even when empty.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Token
member.summary: A security token. If empty, won't be included in the connection string.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.UseDefaultCredentials
member.summary: Determines if the default credentials will be send with the request

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Username
member.summary: A username token. If empty, won't be included in the connection string.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Password
member.summary: A password token. If empty, won't be included in the connection string.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportingEngineConnectionStringBuilder.Timeout
member.summary: A timeout token determining The timeout for rendering a document measured in seconds. The default value is 100 seconds. if set to 0, the connection timeout will never expire.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportViewerUtils.ClearReportSourceFromHistory(Telerik.Reporting.ReportSource,System.String,Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ServerReportViewerHistory)
member.summary: Removes from history all the remote report sources that have the same connection string as the current(expired) one

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ReportViewerUtils.AreConnectionsEqual(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: If the new and the old connection have different connection strings, clear the session id.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.tasks
member.summary: Stores the queued tasks to be executed by our pool of STA threads.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.threads
member.summary: The STA threads used by the scheduler.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the StaTaskScheduler class with the specified concurrency level.
member.param: The number of threads that should be created and used by this scheduler.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.QueueTask(System.Threading.Tasks.Task)
member.summary: Queues a Task to be executed by this scheduler.
member.param: The task to be executed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.GetScheduledTasks
member.summary: Provides a list of the scheduled tasks for the debugger to consume.
member.returns: An enumerable of all tasks currently scheduled.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.TryExecuteTaskInline(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether a Task may be inlined.
member.param: The task to be executed.
Whether the task was previously queued.
member.returns: true if the task was successfully inlined; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.Dispose
member.summary: Cleans up the scheduler by indicating that no more tasks will be queued. This method blocks until all threads successfully shutdown.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.StaTaskScheduler.MaximumConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: Gets the maximum concurrency level supported by this scheduler.

An object that contains the event data.

member.summary: Provides data for tooltip related event raised from desktop viewers.

member.summary: Gets the toolTip instance

member.summary: Gets the relative coordinates in pixels of the mouse cursor according to the report item that shows the tooltip.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Common.ToolTipOpeningEventArgs.Bounds
member.summary: Gets the client bounds in pixels of the element that shows the tooltip

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.
